document.full_text: around 150 militants armed with rockets attacked a security checkpost in pakistan's waziristan on thursday, killing eight soldiers, intelligence officials said, as tensions rise in the volatile northwestern region along the afghan border.
document.title: over 100 militants attack pakistan's northwest
lines_and_colors: around 150 militants armed with rockets attacked a security checkpost in pakistan's waziristan on thursday, killing eight soldiers, intelligence officials said, as tensions rise in the volatile northwestern region along the afghan border.
